#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <fstream>
#include <memory.h>
#include <queue>
#include <cmath>
#include <set>

using namespace std;

const int N = 1010;
const int inf = 0x3f3f3f3f;
const long long oo = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3fll;
const int mod = 1e9 + 7;

int n;

string IntToString(int x){
	if(x == 0) return "00";
	if(x == 1) return "01";
	if(x == 2) return "10";
	return "11";
}

void Cal(char c, string &N1, string &N2){
	int n = 0;
	if(c >= 'A' && c <= 'Z') n = c - 'A' + 10;
	else n = c - '0';
	N1 += IntToString(n / 4);
	N2 += IntToString(n % 4);
}

void Add(string a, string b){
	stack<int> sk;
	int t = 0;
	for(int i = a.size(); i >= 1; i--){
		int s = a[i - 1] - '0' + b[i - 1] - '0' + t;
		t = s / 2;
		s %= 2;
		sk.push(s);
	}
	while(sk.size()){
		printf("%d", sk.top());
		sk.pop();
	}
	puts("");
}

int main(){
	scanf("%d\n", &n);
	string N1, N2;
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
		char c = getchar();
		Cal(c, N1, N2);
	}
	Add(N1, N2);
    return 0;
}
